text: Magnolia amoena (common name Tianmu magnolia, so called from Tianmu Mountain where it grows) is a species of plant in the family Magnoliaceae. It is endemic to China. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Gallery== File:Magnolia amoena bud.jpg|Bud File:Magnolia amoena flower.jpg|Flower File:Magnolia amoena flower detail.jpg|Flower detail ==References== ==External links== *Magnolia amoena images at the Arnold Arboretum of Harvard University Plant Image Database Category:Flora of China amoena Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Magnolia amoena
